thread.section_title: Partykrakow.co.uk recenzje | Opinie konsumentów na temat Partykrakow.co.uk | www.partykrakow.com
thread.title: Anthony Tan
thread.title_full: Partykrakow.co.uk został oceniony przez Anthony Tan

author: Anthony Tan
title: Anthony Tan
text:
We organised this trip extremely last minute but the team was able to put together a great cost effective itinery for us.
In particular our tour guides for the weekend were both outstanding. They did not just pick us and take us, but participated and had great local knowledge. They were contactable and always on hand to help. I highly recommend both JJ and Kasia, absolutely superb. Hope to come to Krakow again soon.
